custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CommerceAccount LEFT JOIN CommerceAccountUserRel ON CommerceAccountUserRel.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId LEFT JOIN CommerceAccountOrganizationRel ON CommerceAccountOrganizationRel.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId LEFT JOIN Organization_ ON Organization_.organizationId = CommerceAccountOrganizationRel.organizationId LEFT JOIN Organization_ Org2 ON Org2.treePath LIKE Organization_.treePath LEFT JOIN Users_Orgs ON Users_Orgs.organizationId = Org2.organizationId WHERE [$PARENT_ACCOUNT_ID$] ( (Users_Orgs.userId IS NULL) OR (Users_Orgs.userId = [$USER_ID$]) ) AND ( (CommerceAccountUserRel.userId IS NULL) OR (CommerceAccountUserRel.userId = [$USER_ID$]) )

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CommerceAccount LEFT JOIN CommerceAccountUserRel ON CommerceAccountUserRel.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId LEFT JOIN CommerceAccountOrganizationRel ON CommerceAccountOrganizationRel.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId LEFT JOIN Organization_ ON Organization_.organizationId = CommerceAccountOrganizationRel.organizationId LEFT JOIN Organization_ Org2 ON Org2.treePath LIKE Organization_.treePath LEFT JOIN Users_Orgs ON Users_Orgs.organizationId = Org2.organizationId WHERE [$PARENT_ACCOUNT_ID$] ( (Users_Orgs.userId IS NULL) OR (Users_Orgs.userId = [$USER_ID$]) ) AND ( (CommerceAccountUserRel.userId IS NULL) OR (CommerceAccountUserRel.userId = [$USER_ID$]) )
